dr.evolution.alignment
Class SimpleSiteList

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.alignment.SimpleSiteList
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternList, SiteList, TaxonList, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
public class SimpleSiteList
extends java.lang.Object
implements SiteList

Stores a set of site patterns. This is setup by loading site patterns using the addPattern method. It is assumed they are added in order.

Version:
$Id: SimpleSiteList.java,v 1.1 2005/06/23 13:53:41 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
See Also:
Serialized Form
